changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE leads ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, uuid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, address_id BIGINT, salutation VARCHAR(50), first_name VARCHAR(256), last_name VARCHAR(256), title VARCHAR(256), phone VARCHAR(256), -- mobile VARCHAR(256), email VARCHAR(256), rating VARCHAR(256), company VARCHAR(256), industry VARCHAR(256), no_of_employees BIGINT, leader_owner VARCHAR(36), updated_by VARCHAR(256), created_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMP, created_at TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(256), is_deleted TINYINT );
